title: Sprint
data:
{{version030}}
''This page is about the monster spell. For the fast-paced alternate version of ''Crawl'', see [[Dungeon Sprint]].''
{{flavour|Causes the caster to move across terrain more rapidly for a short duration.}}

'''Sprint''' is a monster-only spell which reduces the caster's [[movement delay]] by 0.3 [[decaAut]],<ref>{{source ref|0.30.1|monster.cc|5506}}</ref> thus increasing their movement speed. For a regular, 100% speed monster, this increases speed by 42.3%.

{{monsters with spell}}

Also, [[player ghost]]s receive this spell instead of [[Swiftness]].

==History==
*Sprint was added in [[0.16]].

==References==
